ygData.subject: Re: Research Items
ygData.msgSnippet: A high level aquaintence insisted I buy a rare research item from him, so I bought Ice of Velious for 31 plat. Anyone know what it s for? I also was given Eye
ygData.messageBody:
A high level aquaintence insisted I buy a rare research item from him,
so I bought Ice of Velious for 31 plat. Anyone know what it's for? I also
was given Eye of Serlious (something like that) and have no idea what it's
for. Both of the items became stackable after the patch so I assume they are
research items.

Has anyone found a good use for learning different languages? With most
of the books being translated online, it seems the only reason to learn a
different language is for when you get a rare research formula book, if they
exist.

Hiretsukan
25 Magician
Rellos Zek
